author: "Ryan Garnett"

Developing a data analytics program within the a legacy insurance organization has its challenges, related to culture, building trust, showing value, navigating policies, and recruiting top talent. I join Rachael Dempsey, host of the Data Science Hangout podcast, where we discuss building a data practice and data leadership within the health insurance industry.
